reviewText: While we in North America are still waiting for Disney Inc. to get off its proverbial lump and release the rest of their catalog to Blu-ray, you can snatch up Hercules via this import. Perfect transfer. One absence - we're missing the Michael Bolton music video 'Go the Distance' replaced on this disc with the Spanish version sung by Ricky Martin. Otherwise, a definite yes.
Mine and my son's favorite Disney movie. We have watched it since it came out years ago. What a fantastic movie

if you can't wait. This plays excellent the picture is awesome The sound is great. The son of the God Zesu. Is kidnaped by Zesu jealous brother Hades mineons. Hades wish to overthrow Zesu. The plane is to make Zesu son Hercules mortal so he can be killed. The story is if Hercules fights Hades loses.

Great new telling of a time honored story of a super hero. I have always considered James Woods an incredible actor and he certainly doesn't disappoint as Hades in this film. He is brilliant in the role and the story is about good home spun values. I highly recommend this film for all age groups. Adults will enjoy it along with the kids.
not a bad copy of the movie, its clearly unconverted HD but its a good copy of the movie.
Great movie, great addition to add to your Disney collection or blu ray collection.
Great Movie and has several languages that I enjoy listening to.
Great picture and can be enjoyed in several languages.
A favorite movie now on Blu-Ray.  Wonderful.
